definition: a set containing all and only the members of two or more given sets, make contact or come together
details:
noun
- a set containing all and only the members of two or more given sets
= synonyms: union
- the shape or manner in which things come together and a connection is made
= synonyms: articulation
verb
- make contact or come together
= example: make contact or come together
= synonyms: conjoin
- cause to become joined or linked
= example: cause to become joined or linked
= synonyms: bring together
- become part of
= synonyms: get together, fall in
- to come into the company of
= example: to come into the company of
- be or become joined or united or linked
= synonyms: link
